Contact Book database¶

class src.database.database.Connect_db(url: str)¶

class Connect_db is responsible for the connection with the database

Parameters:

  • url (str) – url of the database

  • engine (sqlalchemy engine type) – database engine

  • session (Session) – session

Contact Book model¶

class src.database.models.Contact(**kwargs)¶

Sqlalchemy class Contact for the database of the contacts

Parameters:

  • id (int) – id of the contact

  • firstname (str) – first name of the contact

  • secondname (str) – second name of the contact

  • email (str) – email of the contact

  • phonenumber (str) – phone number of the contact

  • dateofbirth (str) – date of birth of the contact

  • user_id – id of the authorized user

  • user – is used for the connection with the table User

class src.database.models.User(**kwargs)¶

Sqlalchemy class User for the database of the authorized users

Parameters:

  • id (int) – id of the user

  • username (str) –

  • email (str) –

  • password (str) –

  • created_at (datetime) – phone number of the contact

  • avatar (str) – date of birth of the contact

  • refresh_token – token for the authorized user

  • confirmed – True if user is authorized

Contact Book repository contacts¶

class src.repository.contacts.BaseContact(db: Session, user: User)¶

Bases: object

class BaseContact is a base class for the rest of the contact classes. It is a common part of all derived classes

Parameters:

  • db (Session) – database for the connection

  • user (User) – authorized user

Contact Book routes auth¶

class src.routes.auth.Login(*, db: Session = Depends(Connect_db))¶
Parameters:

db (Session) – database connection

async confirmed_email(*, token: str)¶
Parameters:

token – token for confirmation

async login(*, body: OAuth2PasswordRequestForm = Depends(OAuth2PasswordRequestForm))¶

route for the login page

Parameters:

body – fastapi OAuth2PasswordRequestForm

async refresh_token(*, credentials: HTTPAuthorizationCredentials = Security(HTTPBearer))¶
Parameters:

credentials – credentials of the authorized user

async request_email(*, body: RequestEmail, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request)¶
Parameters:

  • body – request email form

  • background_tasks – fastapi BackgroundTasks

  • request – fasapi Request

async signup(*, body: UserModel, background_tasks: BackgroundTasks, request: Request)¶

route for sign up

Parameters:

  • body – body request fir the UserModel

  • background_tasks – fastapi BackgroundTasks

  • request – fastapi Request
